P

pause() - Method in class CrazyCopter.Game
Pauses the game by changing the game state
play - Variable in class CrazyCopter.screens.Menu
Play button user clicks when they are ready to start playing OnClick() starts game
Player - Class in CrazyCopter.entity
Based on the CoreObject class Player is the helicopter in the game and associated with a selected PlayerProfile
Player(int, int, int, Texture) - Constructor for class CrazyCopter.entity.Player
Parameterized constructor
Player(int, int, int, int, int, int, Texture) - Constructor for class CrazyCopter.entity.Player
Parameterized alternate constructor
PLAYER - Static variable in class CrazyCopter.libs.Identities
ID for player's helicopter
PLAYER_VELOCITY_Y - Static variable in class CrazyCopter.libs.Reference
The speed of movement of the helicopter in the y-axis (gravity/falling speed) Positive value moves down the screen Negative value moves up the screen
PlayerProfile - Class in CrazyCopter.Database
Player profile class Used to save user's name.
PlayerProfile(String) - Constructor for class CrazyCopter.Database.PlayerProfile
Constructor
PlayerProfile(String, int) - Constructor for class CrazyCopter.Database.PlayerProfile
Alternative constructor
PlayerProfile(String, int, int) - Constructor for class CrazyCopter.Database.PlayerProfile
Alternative constructor
PRESSED - Static variable in class CrazyCopter.input.MouseInput
Is the mouse pressed? True = yes False = no
